title: My Three Speed
description: When framed for a crime he did not commit, Eric Turner, 16, flees on his bike, launching the adventure of his life. Racing through Minnesota and fighting his way through the Canadian wilderness, he faces challenge after challenge and only his quick wits and accumulating skills keep him going. The last thing he expects to find among everything else that is happening is a well-kept family secret. This is a quick, relaxing read for any given day.
author: Phineas Ghent
